cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on February 2, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6361, District of Columbia National Guard Commanding General Residency Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 6 (Monday, January 10, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 6361.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H9]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 21 - 17.

title: District of Columbia National Guard Commanding General Residency Act
